headline: Trump Exempts Some Electronics, Including Smartphones, From Tariffs on China
summary: President Trump’s tariff exemptions on some electronics are the latest twist in U.S. trade policy and could benefit companies such as Apple, Microsoft, Dell, Samsung and others that manufacture some products abroad.

raw.headline: Trump Exempts Some Electronics, Including Smartphones, From Tariffs on China
raw.summary: President Trump’s tariff exemptions on some electronics are the latest twist in U.S. trade policy and could benefit companies such as Apple, Microsoft, Dell, Samsung and others that manufacture some products abroad.

headline: Apple, Nvidia, and Microsoft can 'breathe a huge sigh of relief' after Trump's China tariff exemptions
summary: The ever-growing U.S. tariffs on imports from China won’t bite Big Tech so badly after all, after the Trump administration late Friday laid out significant exemptions from its wider trade war that include smartphones, laptop computers, chips, and more.

raw.headline: Apple, Nvidia, and Microsoft can 'breathe a huge sigh of relief' after Trump's China tariff exemptions
raw.summary: The ever-growing U.S. tariffs on imports from China won’t bite Big Tech so badly after all, after the Trump administration late Friday laid out significant exemptions from its wider trade war that include smartphones, laptop computers, chips, and more.

headline: Mark Zuckerberg's empire at stake as Meta prepares to battle Trump's antitrust cops in court
summary: Meta is preparing for the start of a courtroom battle Monday with the US government in an antitrust case that could force Mark Zuckerberg to break up his $1.3 trillion empire and sell one of its crown jewels: Instagram.

headline: 'Global diversification is back' as US exceptionalism fades
summary: Markets (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) are shifting as investors look beyond the once-dominant "Magnificent Seven" and focus on international equities gaining traction. Horizon Investments head of research and quantitative strategies Mike Dickson joins Market Domination to discuss why global diversification may be the new core strategy as capital moves away from US assets. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Meet Walmart heir Steuart Walton, the most powerful board member you’ve never heard of
summary: Steuart Walton, the grandson of Walmart founder, Sam Walton, is destined to oversee the family fortune. He has been on the board without much fanfare since 2016 and may be the most important board member that you haven't heard of.
